a.title: Return to the homepage on the district site.

div.h2: Educating today's learners for tomorrow's world.
div.p: 207 Main Avenue West, West Fargo ND 58078
207 Main Avenue West, West Fargo ND 58078

div.ul:
"
Freedom Elementary School
Horace Elementary School
Office of the Superintendent
Special Education
COVID-19

ul.li: 3/25/20: While we will continue to email staff directly, please utilize this new webpage as a one-stop-shop for all staff communications and documents related to COVID-19 and distance learning.

a.title: Go to comments for Site Purpose

ul.li: The amount of support that West Fargo Public Schools receives from community businesses is vital to the success of our students, staff, and operations. So many of them have reached out to us these past few weeks to provide help and assistance, all the while undergoing changes to their own operations that are leaving many uncertain about their financial future. If your building has experienced gratitude from a local agency or business in relation to our closure and distance learning plan, please send details to Stephanie Hansen, Public Relations Specialist, at shansen@west-fargo.k12.nd.us. If you have any photos to share, please include them as file attachments to the email.

a.title: Go to comments for Community Support
